TABLE.NAME: groupquiz
TABLE.COMMENT: each record is one groupquiz resource

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: intro text format.

FIELD.NAME: timeopen
FIELD.COMMENT: The time when this quiz opens. (0 = no restriction.)

FIELD.NAME: timeclose
FIELD.COMMENT: The time when this quiz closes. (0 = no restriction.)

FIELD.NAME: timelimit
FIELD.COMMENT: The time limit for quiz attempts, in seconds.

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: The total that the quiz is scaled out of.

FIELD.NAME: grademethod
FIELD.COMMENT: The grading method for grading. This only applies to grading with multiple sessions, not multiple attempts

FIELD.NAME: reviewattempt
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether users are allowed to review their quiz attempts at various times. This is a bit field, decoded by the mod_groupquiz_display_options class. It is formed by ORing together the constants defined there.

FIELD.NAME: reviewcorrectness
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether users are allowed to review their quiz attempts at various times. A bit field, like reviewattempt.

FIELD.NAME: reviewmarks
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether users are allowed to review their quiz attempts at various times. A bit field, like reviewattempt.

FIELD.NAME: reviewspecificfeedback
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether users are allowed to review their quiz attempts at various times. A bit field, like reviewattempt.

FIELD.NAME: reviewgeneralfeedback
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether users are allowed to review their quiz attempts at various times. A bit field, like reviewattempt.

FIELD.NAME: reviewrightanswer
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether users are allowed to review their quiz attempts at various times. A bit field, like reviewattempt.

FIELD.NAME: reviewoverallfeedback
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether users are allowed to review their quiz attempts at various times. A bit field, like reviewattempt.

FIELD.NAME: reviewmanualcomment
FIELD.COMMENT: The comment that instructors can add when grading an attempt

FIELD.NAME: grouping
FIELD.COMMENT: The grouping id that this activity is set up to use for groups

FIELD.NAME: questionorder
FIELD.COMMENT: The question order for the activequiz

FIELD.NAME: shuffleanswers
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the parts of the question should be shuffled, in those question types that support it.

FIELD.NAME: showuserpicture
FIELD.COMMENT: Option to show the user's picture during the attempt and on the review page.

FIELD.NAME: requireallmemberssubmit
FIELD.COMMENT: If enabled, an attempt will not be accepted until all group members have submitted it.

INDEX.NAME: course
INDEX.COMMENT: The course this assignment instance belongs to.

TABLE.NAME: groupquiz_grades
TABLE.COMMENT: groupquiz grades table to hold grades for individual users

FIELD.NAME: groupquizid
FIELD.COMMENT: the groupquiz id

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The userid that this grade is for

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: The grade for this user, for this groupquiz lab

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The time created/modified for this grade

TABLE.NAME: groupquiz_attempts
TABLE.COMMENT: The groupquiz attempts table to hold attempts for students

FIELD.NAME: groupquizid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the groupquiz lab for this attempt

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The userid for this attempt

FIELD.NAME: userstart
FIELD.COMMENT: The userid that started this attempt

FIELD.NAME: userstop
FIELD.COMMENT: The userid that stopped this attempt

FIELD.NAME: attemptnum
FIELD.COMMENT: The attempt number for this group

FIELD.NAME: uniqueid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key reference to the question_usage that holds the details of the the question_attempts that make up this quiz attempt.

FIELD.NAME: forgroupid
FIELD.COMMENT: The groupid will go here to signify that this attempt is for that group

FIELD.NAME: layout
FIELD.COMMENT: the layout for this particular attempt

FIELD.NAME: sumgrades
FIELD.COMMENT: Total marks for this attempt.

FIELD.NAME: state
FIELD.COMMENT: The current state of the attempts. 'inprogress', 'overdue', 'finished' or 'abandoned'.

FIELD.NAME: timestart
FIELD.COMMENT: The time this attempt began

FIELD.NAME: timefinish
FIELD.COMMENT: The time this attempt ended

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The time this attempt was modified

TABLE.NAME: groupquiz_questions
TABLE.COMMENT: table to hold question information for group quizzes

FIELD.NAME: groupquizid
FIELD.COMMENT: The groupquiz this question instance is associated with

FIELD.NAME: questionid
FIELD.COMMENT: The question id for the question in the question engine

FIELD.NAME: points
FIELD.COMMENT: How many points this question contributes to quiz.sumgrades.
